trans-unit.source: Provides a set of callbacks that facilitate communication between a participant enlisted for Single Phase Commit and the transaction manager when the <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification.SinglePhaseCommit*> notification is received.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組的回呼，以便為單一階段認可與交易管理員已登錄的參與者之間的通訊時<xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification.SinglePhaseCommit*>收到通知。</xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification.SinglePhaseCommit*>

trans-unit.source: When a resource manager's implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification.SinglePhaseCommit%2A> is called, and an instance of this type is passsed in, the participant then notifies the transaction manager via the <xref:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Committed%2A> method or the <xref:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Aborted%2A> method to indicate whether the transaction should be committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 當資源管理員的實作<xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification.SinglePhaseCommit%2A>呼叫，而且此類型的執行個體中的 passsed，參與者然後通知的交易管理員透過<xref:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Committed%2A>方法或<xref:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Aborted%2A>方法，指出是否應該認可或回復交易。</xref:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Aborted%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Committed%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification.SinglePhaseCommit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the transaction should be rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 表示回呼，用來向交易管理員，則應該會復原交易。

trans-unit.source: A transaction participant implementing the <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification> interface uses this method to notify the transaction manager that it cannot commit, and that the transaction should be rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 交易參與者實作<xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification>介面使用這個方法來通知之交易管理員無法認可，而且應該會回復交易。</xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification>

trans-unit.source: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the transaction should be rolled back, and provides an explanation.
trans-unit.target: 表示回呼，用來向交易管理員，交易將會回復，並提供說明。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of why a rollback is initiated.
Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the SinglePhaseCommit was successful.
trans-unit.target: 表示用來向交易管理員 SinglePhaseCommit 成功的回呼。

trans-unit.source: A transaction participant implementing the <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification> interface uses this method to notify the transaction manager that the transaction should be committed.
trans-unit.target: 交易參與者實作<xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification>介面使用這個方法來通知之交易管理員應該認可交易。</xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification>

trans-unit.source: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the status of the transaction is in doubt.
trans-unit.target: 表示回呼，用來向交易管理員處於不確定交易的狀態。

trans-unit.source: A transaction participant implementing the <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification> interface uses this method to notify the transaction manager that the transaction is in doubt.
trans-unit.target: 交易參與者實作<xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification>介面通知的交易處於不確定的交易管理員會使用這個方法。</xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification>

trans-unit.source: A transaction is in doubt when one or more of the enlisted resource managers cannot be contacted.
trans-unit.target: 交易處於不確定當一或多個已登錄的資源管理員無法連線。

trans-unit.source: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the status of the transaction is in doubt, and provides an explanation.
trans-unit.target: 表示回呼，用來向交易管理員，在不確定，交易的狀態，並提供說明。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of why the transaction is in doubt.
